org.apache.hadoop.examples

类 RandomWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.examples.RandomWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    public class RandomWriter
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    This program uses map/reduce to just run a distributed job where there is no interaction between the tasks and each task write a large unsorted random binary sequence file of BytesWritable. In order for this program to generate data for terasort with 10-byte keys and 90-byte values, have the following config: <?xml version="1.0"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="configuration.xsl"?> <configuration> <property> <name>mapreduce.randomwriter.minkey</name> <value>10</value> </property> <property> <name>mapreduce.randomwriter.maxkey</name> <value>10</value> </property> <property> <name>mapreduce.randomwriter.minvalue</name> <value>90</value> </property> <property> <name>mapreduce.randomwriter.maxvalue</name> <value>90</value> </property> <property> <name>mapreduce.randomwriter.totalbytes</name> <value>1099511627776</value> </property> </configuration> Equivalently, RandomWriter also supports all the above options and ones supported by GenericOptionsParser via the command-line.

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public int run(String[] args)
        throws Exception
        This is the main routine for launching a distributed random write job. It runs 10 maps/node and each node writes 1 gig of data to a DFS file. The reduce doesn't do anything.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
        抛出:
        IOException
        Exception

      • main

                 throws Exception
